text: Dave Recher (born December 30, 1942) is a former American football center. He played for the Philadelphia Eagles from 1965 to 1968. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Players of American football from Illinois Category:American football centers Category:Iowa Hawkeyes football players Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:People from Skokie, Illinois
title: Dave Recher
